data.title: Dartmouth's Jenny Slate stars in romantic drama 'It Ends with Us.' Here's the story.
data.meta_description: Watch Dartmouth celebrity Jenny Slate opposite Blake Lively in the romantic drama film 'It Ends With Us' this week. Here's what it's about.
data.text:
DARTMOUTH â€” Dartmouth resident Jenny Slate stars in the highly anticipated movie "It Ends With Us," which opens in theaters nationwide on Thursday.

The film, adapted from the popular novel by Colleen Hoover, tells the story of Lily, who overcomes a difficult childhood and begins a new life. A chance encounter with a neurosurgeon named Ryle sparks a connection that leads her to confront her past and the ways it has shaped her present.

Slate plays Allysa, Lily's supportive friend who helps her navigate her complicated relationship with Ryle. She stars alongside Blake Lively as Lily and Justin Baldoni as Ryle.

Slate at the 2023 Oscars: Dartmouth resident Jenny Slate turned heads at the Academy Awards, supporting two major films

How the cast in 'It Ends With Us' compares to the book

The casting of Lively and Baldoni has caused some controversy among fans of the book. In the novel, Lily is 23 years old and Ryle is 30, but Lively is 35 and Baldoni is 39. In press with Entertainment Tonight, Lively has praised Slate's performance as a standout in the film, calling her "full of love and light."

Slate's journey to landing this coveted role was not an easy one. Slate beat out several A-list actors for the role, including Daisy Edgar-Jones, Lucy Hale, Florence Pugh, Margot Robbie, Saoirse Ronan and Anya Taylor-Joy.

When to watch 'It Ends With Us' on opening weekend

On Thursday, Aug. 8, audiences can view the film at AMC Dartmouth Mall 11 at 2, 5, 7:30, 8 and 10:05 p.m. The Picture Show at South Coast Marketplace in Fall River is showing the film at 2:50, 6 and 9:10 p.m.

On Friday, Aug. 9, AMC Dartmouth Mall is showing the film at 11 a.m., 1, 2, 4, 5, 7, 8 and 9:55 p.m.; on Saturday at noon, 1, 3, 4, 6, 7, 9 and 10 p.m.

A full list of showtimes are available on the film's official website.

Free outdoor concerts this summer: A guide to the New Bedford and Fall River area

Who is Jenny Slate?

Born and raised in Milton, Slate rose to fame after appearing on NBC's "Saturday Night Live" and "Parks and Recreation." But it was her voice acting that first put her on the map with roles on "Bob's Burgers," "Big Mouth," and "Zootopia." However, Slate's talents extend far beyond acting.

Slate has also gained recognition and critical acclaim for her stand-up comedy and live variety shows in New York City and for co-creating, writing and producing the children's short film and book series "Marcel the Shell with Shoes On."

Slate is currently filming another movie locally in Massachusetts alongside Amy Adams titled "At The Sea." The film has been shooting in various locations around the state, including Marshfield, Plymouth and Cape Cod.

She lives in Dartmouth with husband, author Ben Shattuck.
